thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Fujian Cosunter Pharmaceutical receives GMP certificate

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fujian Cosunter Pharmaceutical receives GMP certificate

organizations.name: reuters) - fujian cosunter pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
March 8(Reuters) - Fujian Cosunter Pharmaceutical Co Ltd :
* Says it received goods manufacture practice (GMP) certificate from Fujian Food and Drug Administration
* Says certificate issued to adefovir dipivoxil manufactured by the company and the valid period is until Feb. 22, 2023
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/J3DEyk
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
